phrases: Hi Stefan, Ovais has the meta glasses. So he will give it to you after he has tried them. KR, Alex

Before We Discuss: I want to share how I see things — a starting point, not a conclusion. Same approach I'd use for a software problem: identify issues, look at data, propose solutions. Discussed with the PM team — some alignment exists. A rough candidate — starting material that needs more work. Looking for your perspective to shape this together.

What This Costs Us: Misalignment — Product and R&D have different mental models of what done means. No urgency — Without an end date, there's no forcing function. Busywork — We create PowerPoints and status decks because DevOps doesn't tell the story. Dependencies — Features span multiple epics — nothing is truly independent.

Dear SWART LT, I'd like to have your support to review this change request from HSX ART: Request: Updating all configurations containing Evolve 3 55 to Evolve 3 65 in the Jabra+ system for Taurus in Sprint 2 of 2026Q1PI. Looking forward to getting your approval, thank you very much. Best Regards, Frank Zhang
